titles.title: Save Access to a Valuable Investment Needed to Generate Savings Act of 2015
SAVINGS Act
To amend title 31, United States Code, to require the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the purchase of paper United States savings bonds with tax refunds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
3/26/2015--Introduced. Save Access to a Valuable Investment Needed to Generate Savings Act of 2015 or the SAVINGS Act
Directs the Department of the Treasury to: (1) allow individual taxpayers an option to purchase U.S. savings bonds in paper form with a portion or all of a tax refund during the period ending on December 31, 2020; or (2) implement an alternative option that allows for the gifting of U.S. savings bonds, serves the unbanked, and retains the ability to sign-up on the return of tax.
